pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tukey's Vacuum Cleaner // An implementation of three procedures developed by John Tukey: FUNOP (FUll NOrmal Plot), FUNOR-FUNOM (FUll NOrmal Rejection-FUll NOrmal Modification), and vacuum cleaner. Combined, they provide a way to identify, treat, and analyze outliers in two-way (i.e., contingency) tables, as described in his landmark paper "The Future of Data Analysis", Tukey, John W. (1962) https://www.jstor.org/stable/2237638.
